document_data.mainbody:
Portal sherry was a type of sherry, or fortified wine, found in the Western Heartlands, along the River Chionthar, and the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
This sherry was bottled in bottles of distinct design. The bottles sides were decorated with large overlapping gateways.
It was believed that anyone who consumed the entire bottle of portal sherry would awaken in a new and exciting location.
